website_summaries.verdict: Though a bit short on features, the 27-inch Dell S2718D is a strikingly thin In-Plane Switching (IPS) monitor that delivers accurate colors, solid grayscale reproduction, and wide viewing angles.
pros: Good color, grayscale, and viewing-angle performance

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Update : After my monitor went out Dell replaced it in about 24 hours no hassle . Dell customer for life now
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for usb-c equipped computers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for use with my 2017 MacBook Pro. While the 1600p resolution is “sub-retina,” it is more than sufficient for my needs The usb-c port has worked flawlessly, giving me the flexibility of a true one-cable solutions (power, video, and data). I highly recommend this monitor to MacBook pro (2016-17) owners looking for a large screen and who are willing to trade off some sharpness for a drastic reduction in price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it weren't fatally flawed; plan to return
customer_reviews.text: ...and returning this huge, heavy, delicate thing is going to be such a hassle. The electronics on this monitor have some kind of issue that causes it to occasionally restart itself. Since it's a USB pass-through, it's not just a display and it must handle things other than just pushing pixels to a screen. The box is like a tiny, specialized PC. Unfortunately, that PC sometimes crashes and when that happens, the whole monitor goes black and then starts back up with the "Dell" logo. Sometimes I can go a whole day without this happening. More often, it happens once every couple of hours. It's infuriating!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, but will it last?
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this monitor. My Dell laptop and my MBP2018 was able to connect with the USB-C connection just fine. However after 4 months of ownership, the USB-C connection stopped working. The display would constantly say that it couldn't find signal, and when you plug it in the laptop display starts flickering like crazy because it keeps trying to connect. That said, it's covered under the Dell manufacturer warranty, so I should be getting a replacement. Hopefully the next one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Barber

customer_reviews.title: Good display, bad mounting
customer_reviews.text: The display is pretty good. Clear, crisp, but a little slow on the refresh. My biggest complaint is the stand. It wobbles like crazy. As you type, the screen bounces around a ton because the arm it is mounted on is very very flimsy. Fix the mount where the screen attached to the arm and it would be a very good display for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fear

customer_reviews.title: Great external monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor to pair with a 27-inch iMac. This was the 2nd monitor I purchased (the first from a different brand arrived with pixels blown out and was unusable). No issues setting this up -- plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my 2016 Macbook Pro 13
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my 2016 Macbook Pro 13. I'm able to use a single USB-C cable for both video and power.
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor. Works well with a macbook pro 13' ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Works well with a macbook pro 13' 2017 with tb though the 1 usb-c cable connection. I'm in no way an expert on monitors or anything but I really like this one. The colors seem nice to me and the slim bezels are cool. It would have been perfect if this monitor had a speaker but I'll buy this configuration again with no doubt if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: omer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, high value 2k monitor
customer_reviews.text: These occasionally go on sale and the fit-n-finish is wonderful. The screen is bright, crisp, with excellent color reproduction and view angles. I use this for work and so can't speak to whether it's refresh rate is appropriate for gaming. My only (very small) gripe is that the USB ports are on the back and difficult to get to. It's fine for setup, but not great as a hub.
customer_reviews.author: Meade

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Perfect for my 2018 MacBook Pro. Definitely worth the extra money compared to cheaper monitors of similar size. USB-C connection so it charges MacBook during use. Nice to only have a single cable connected. Clear picture that looks great. Beautiful monitor with same brushed silver finish as my MacBook -- looks like they were meant to be paired. Has a couple of USB ports on the back that make up for the new MacBook's lack thereof. Also doesn't seem to encounter the internet connectivity issues experienced with other USB adapters. Only shortcomings are inability to adjust height (I just put a large book under) and no speakers. Neither of these were a big deal to me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, and just perfect if your computer has USB-C
customer_reviews.text: In my tech career of 13+ years, I've used a fair share of a variety of monitors. Granted, the technology evolved, but this monitor is the best that I've evert used! It's made with high quality materials, and the picture quality is superb. What's cherry on top for me is that I can connect to my laptop with one signle usb-c cable, and I get both - video and power. I highly recomment this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: There is no sound, so you need to but external speakers, which is annoying. There is no camera. Whan would like to plug in their laptop through the USBC cable and afford all the functions with the big screen that you get with the small screen but that is not the case here
customer_reviews.author: Rick Marcena

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on 2018 Macbook Pro 15''
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2018 Macbook Pro 15'' and did not work over USB-C. Tried connecting it via my USB to HDMI adapter and did not work either. Bottom line, beware of buying this is you are planning on using it with your Macbook Pro over USB-C. Don't know about other Macbook products.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Moreno

customer_reviews.title: I used this monitor to connect my 2016 15" Macbook ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this monitor to connect my 2016 15" Macbook Pro. It comes with all the cables needed and doubles as a docking station for my set up - where I have speakers, USB mouse and keyboard plugged to the USB ports on the monitor and have a single USB C running to my Macbook which charges while transferring data back.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but don't buy for HDR
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor and have owned it for several years. It's great for photo editing and creative apps. My one complaint is that the HDR mode has a sharpening feature hardcoded into the firmware that makes the HDR look terrible. Unfortunately, this feature cannot be turned off and it does not look like Dell will ever patch the issue. (I have tested this with Windows and with a PS4 Slim and both encounter the oversharpening problem when HDR is enabled.) Overall this a great monitor for productivity but don't buy it for the HDR.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working With MacBook Pro 2018
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked for about a year with my 2018 macbook pro. I was very happy with the quality and ease of use. A couple days ago the monitor stopped working and the display no longer shows up on the monitor. I contacted apple and they said it was problem with the monitor not the computer. I contacted Dell and they said since the monitor was out of warranty there was nothing they can do to help me. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Loker

customer_reviews.title: Love The Picture Quality And Monitor Looks
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality monitor even though it is not full 4K. I use it for office applications and the text and photos and very crisp. The monitor is so thin my coworkers are jealous of the looks.
customer_reviews.author: pakibhai

customer_reviews.title: Major pros. Minor cons.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Very thin. Looks very classy on my desk. Charges laptop through usb c if compatible. Overall a joy to use in my home office. Having all the connectors in the base is great for cable clutter haters. I ran mine through a j channel on top of the desk and let them curve out of the j hook into their ports. For a $500-700 monitor, I’m disappointed some. No thunderbolt 3 is annoying. a second c-port for a sdd would have been nice. The amazingly thin screen component feels VEVY fragile on the tilt/rotate mechanism but solidly holds so we’ll see long term.
customer_reviews.author: Rym K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, accurate color straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color right out of the box! It required very little calibration with a Spider. The design of the monitor itself also looks very nice on my desk. I use it for photo editing, and I don't know how I managed to edit on my laptop screen before this!
customer_reviews.author: InclinedToAdventure

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: high quality, USB C monitor alternative for Mac OS for reasonable money.
customer_reviews.author: mr A

customer_reviews.title: Very slick and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wished I could get a stable 75hz OC but other than that, great, super thin monitor. Perfect for those who have a compact setup and needs a slim monitor
customer_reviews.author: Aizen L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with my Late 2016 MacbookPro. Lightning charging works and the resolution is great with no need for scaling. One note: This monitor cannot be mounted as the base is needed for power and cable management.
customer_reviews.author: J. Patrick Moran

customer_reviews.title: Goes after about 18 months
customer_reviews.text: After 18 months I started getting blue and red lines on the right side of my screen. No cracks or anything. The monitor is just dying.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Appel

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my macbook
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this monitor for web design and writing. I works well with my laptop and gives me the large monitor I need for some of my projects. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Whites seem a TAD bit off and it doesn't get as bright as I would like, but I was able to hook up to my MPB 2017 15" with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Openboxes instead of New one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is somehow acceptable quality biu the seller send me openbox Monitor instead of New one!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mostafa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just as described, It would be better if the monitor height can be adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie vieth

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pictures on screen. Easy to connect to a computer/laptop. The bottom part even serves as a USB hub for my PowerBook Pro, which doesn’t have a USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Y L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works great and looks great no matter what we plug into it!
customer_reviews.author: Team Factoid

customer_reviews.title: Finally the screen is a GLOSSY PANEL!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!!! This model is GLOSSY PANEL! Just like a galaxy phone. Amazing resolution perfect for my gaming can totally see all details. Totally reccomend it :)
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing- I have 2 laptops for work I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing- I have 2 laptops for work I bought an HDMI splitter and I can change display between 2 monitors- The display is awesome-
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a work MBP and my personal HP Spectre X360 and the USB-C cord handles charging, audio, and display, which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Reading

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality and durability for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, picture quality is amazing and base is sturdy enough to keep screen in place. Highly recommend given the value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the monitor. It's huge, bright and clear. Small footprint and thin like an OLED TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Chan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic. Ideal for home office setups with limited space
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. Ideal for home office setups with limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B La Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for any computer that can utilize a usb-type c port. Especially useful with the MacBook Pros.
customer_reviews.author: Chandan Kadur

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken in two pieces
customer_reviews.text: Arrived totally destroyed, in a box for another product, with random cables and CD included. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Blistein

customer_reviews.title: The monitor looks very nice. I was unpleasantly surprised that it could not ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor looks very nice. I was unpleasantly surprised that it could not be removed from the base and mounted. I was also dissappointed that I cannot turn it on it's side to view it in portrait mode.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: USB-C connection does not work with MacBook Pro. Will ...
customer_reviews.text: USB-C connection does not work with MacBook Pro. Will charge, but the image will flicker and go black, or not appear at all. Need to use HDMI connection, which then does not charge. Therefore need to use both. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 46329

customer_reviews.title: nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: my user loved it so much, she bought a second one. And then bought her assistant one. Good quality,
customer_reviews.author: jajackson

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is crooked
customer_reviews.text: I received the monitor which is tilting on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Nabin

product_meta.title: Dell (S2718D) S series 27-Inch Screen LED-Lit Monitor, Black/Silver Stand
product_meta.description: Take your view to the edge: With Dell's InfinityEdge display you'll enjoy an expansive entertainment experience. The gorgeous, edge-to-edge view on this virtually borderless display draws you into the scene. This 27” ultrathin monitor features an elegant, state-of-the-art design. The slim riser and sleek, metallic surface complement its premium performance and make it a perfect fit for contemporary environments. USB Type-C connectivity ensures allin-one connectivity management. Meet all your video, data and power needs while reducing cable clutter. Dell HDR (high dynamic range) combines greater color depth, remarkable clarity and high contrast to create strikingly accurate images.
feature_bullets: Stunning design Virtually border less with eye catching craftsmanship; Panel Type :IPS
Brilliant convenience Power, video and data all through convenient built in USB Type C connectivity
Incredible view Rich colors, high contrast, brilliant images Dell HDR; Display Position Adjustments: Tilt (5 to 21 Degree) / Swivel (45 to 45 Degree)
Highly reliable Dell monitors ,the number 1 monitor brand worldwide for three consecutive years.*
Compatibility: All Operating System. You can install the monitor in any Plug and Play compatible system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars114 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
